meanings.definition: A person who performs acrobatic feats on a tightrope.
meanings.sent1: The ropedancers gracefully balanced on the tightrope.
meanings.sent2: The circus featured talented ropedancers showcasing their skills.
meanings.sent3: The ropedancers tried to juggle while walking on the tightrope, causing laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: Watching the ropedancers was like witnessing a delicate dance in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ropedancers swaying high above the ground stayed etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who entertain by walking, dancing, or performing tricks on a rope.
meanings.sent1: The ropedancers amazed the crowd with their synchronized rope performance.
meanings.sent2: At the fair, we saw a lively group of ropedancers captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The ropedancers decided to have a rope race to see who could reach the end first.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the ropedancers was like a well-choreographed show of teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The ropedancers' energy and enthusiasm lit up the entire event.
